entry.sentence: The light , modern bedroom furniture did not want to match this probably very old but wonderfully preserved wood paneling , and so Countess Alice had the wall above the paneling and the ceiling covered tent-like with light blue silk to create a more airy and luminous effect .

entry.sentence: Midnight had long since passed , and everything in the castle was silent .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NNP Midnight)) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB long) (IN since)) (VP (VBN passed)))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (NP (NN everything)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN castle)))) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (JJ silent)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(passed-5, Midnight-1) aux(passed-5, had-2) advmod(since-4, long-3) advmod(passed-5, since-4) root(ROOT-0, passed-5) nsubj(silent-13, everything-8) det(castle-11, the-10) prep_in(everything-8, castle-11) cop(silent-13, was-12) conj_and(passed-5, silent-13)
